scenes.background: You decided to stay involved in the task. [Monica] and [Bob] are discussing the next steps.
scenes.description: 'I think we can handle this more efficiently if we divide the work. What do you think?' She looks at you thoughtfully.

options.text: Sure, let's split the tasks and tackle them individually.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and social skills by agreeing to divide tasks, but empathy is lower as you focus on efficiency.

options.text: I agree. I'll handle my part, but we should communicate frequently to stay aligned.
options.analysis: You show balanced emotional skills by agreeing to split tasks while emphasizing communication, but emotional perception could be better.

options.text: I think it might be better if we work together on each part to ensure accuracy.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and social skills by suggesting collaboration, but self-regulation and emotional perception are lower as you may overextend.
